movie.title: Firewall
movie.description_intro: As a bid to pay off his family's randsom a security specialist named Jack Stanfield is forced into robbing a bank that he is protecting! His family gets kidnapped and taken to the middle of nowhere and it's up to Jack Stanfield to rescue his family and get the money back!
movie.description_full: As a bid to pay off his family's randsom a security specialist named Jack Stanfield is forced into robbing a bank that he is protecting! His family gets kidnapped and taken to the middle of nowhere and it's up to Jack Stanfield to rescue his family and get the money back!

movies.title: The Battleship Island
movies.summary: During the Japanese colonial era, roughly 400 Korean people, who were forced onto Battleship Island ("Hashima Island") to mine for coal, attempt to a dramatic escape.
movies.description_full: During the Japanese colonial era, roughly 400 Korean people, who were forced onto Battleship Island ("Hashima Island") to mine for coal, attempt to a dramatic escape.

movies.title: Monster: The Prehistoric Project
movies.summary: Two Navy SEALS, Trevor and Doug, are sent to an abandoned island in search of a package, but instead of being the hunters, they find they are being hunted. During their escape they come .

movies.title: Empathy, Inc.
movies.summary: An investor in a VR startup discovers that the reality the company provides isn't virtual.
movies.description_full: An investor in a VR startup discovers that the reality the company provides isn't virtual.
movies.synopsis: An investor in a VR startup discovers that the reality the company provides isn't virtual.

movies.title: Jumper
movies.summary: David Rice is a high school student in Ann Arbor, abandoned by his mother at five, living with his callous, alcoholic father, enamored with Millie, a fellow student, and picked on by at least one classmate. On a winter's day, while about to drown, he discovers he can transport himself instantaneously to anyplace on earth. He runs away from home, goes to New York City, robs a bank vault, and comes to the attention of a shadowy group of government hunters. Eight years later, the hunters, led by the murderous Roland, get a fix on David. He heads home, searches out Millie, invites her to travel with him, and only later realizes that Roland and his crew are seriously deadly. Is everyone close to David in danger?
